mapper.select: SELECT seq ,bizcd ,license_cd ,reg_date ,updt_date ,license_no ,license_pd_st ,license_pd_ed ,upper_seq ,(select reg_date from tb_license_used where n.seq = pseq)as used FROM tb_license n where license_cd = #{business_code} and bizcd = #{bizcd} limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}

select seq, bizcd, supply_name, demand_name, license_count, license_cd, register_id, license_period, contract, reg_date from tb_license_biz where license_cd = #{license_cd} and bizcd = #{bizcd} order by reg_date desc limit #{firstRecordIndex}, #{recordCountPerPage}
select count(*) from tb_license_biz where license_cd = #{license_cd} and bizcd = #{bizcd}
